00019 void mexFunction(int n_output, mxArray *output[], int n_input, const mxArray *input[])
00020 {
00021     // Check the number of inputs and output arguments
00022     if(n_output!=1) mexErrMsgTxt("One output required!");
00023     if((n_input!=8)&&(n_input!=11)) mexErrMsgTxt("Eigth or eleven inputs required!");
00024         
00025     tr::SISO siso;
00026     vec extrinsic_data;
00027     if (n_input==8)
00028     {
00029         // Convert input variables to IT++ format
00030         cvec rec_sig = mxArray2cvec(input[0]);
00031         vec apriori_data = mxArray2vec(input[1]);
00032         cvec ch_imp_response = mxArray2cvec(input[2]);
00033         double sigma2 = mxArray2double(input[3]);    
00034         int bits_per_symbol = mxArray2int(input[4]);
00035         cvec constellation = mxArray2cvec(input[5]);
00036         bmat bin_constellation = mxArray2bmat(input[6]);
00037         std::string demapper_method = mxArray2string(input[7]);
00038     
00039         // ------------------ Start of routine ---------------------------
00040         siso.set_impulse_response(ch_imp_response);
00041         siso.set_noise(sigma2);    
00042         siso.set_constellation(bits_per_symbol, constellation, bin_constellation);
00043         siso.set_demapper_method(demapper_method);
00044         siso.demapper(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00045         // ------------------ End of routine -----------------------------
00046     }
00047     else if (n_input==11)
00048     {
00049         // Convert input variables to IT++ format
00050         cmat rec_sig = mxArray2cmat(input[0]);
00051         vec apriori_data = mxArray2vec(input[1]);
00052         cmat ch_imp_response = mxArray2cmat(input[2]);
00053         double sigma2 = mxArray2double(input[3]);    
00054         int bits_per_symbol = mxArray2int(input[4]);
00055         cvec constellation = mxArray2cvec(input[5]);
00056         bmat bin_constellation = mxArray2bmat(input[6]);
00057         int symbols_per_block = mxArray2int(input[7]);
00058         cmat A = mxArray2cmat(input[8]);
00059         cmat B = mxArray2cmat(input[9]);
00060         std::string demapper_method = mxArray2string(input[10]);
00061     
00062         // ------------------ Start of routine ---------------------------
00063         siso.set_impulse_response(ch_imp_response);
00064         siso.set_noise(sigma2);    
00065         siso.set_constellation(bits_per_symbol, constellation, bin_constellation);
00066         siso.set_st_block_code(symbols_per_block, A, B, rec_sig.cols());
00067         siso.set_demapper_method(demapper_method);
00068         siso.demapper(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00069         // ------------------ End of routine -----------------------------
00070     }
00071     
00072     // Convert the IT++ format to Matlab format for output
00073     output[0] = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(1, extrinsic_data.length(), mxREAL);
00074     vec2mxArray(extrinsic_data, output[0]);
00075 }
